duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare individual, business, and fiduciary tax returns and projections in accordance with firm and professional standards.
Communicate directly with existing clients, colleagues, management, and IRS representatives regarding various tax matters, including IRS and state agency audits, inquiries, and tax notices.
Review tax work of less experienced staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or related field. CPA certification (active) preferred.
